divs: sighting details5:29 a.m driving to work from east to west on hwy 62 from warrick co. to vand. co to evansville. still dark outside saw object coming from no. ind. sky at a rate of speed never seen before heading towards evansville then suddenly stopped went back toward n.w. slight climbing elevation for a sec. then changed again and went straight up, again at speed i have never seen and disappeared. airplanes come from that direction landing at e'ville airport but do not glow violet\purple, stop in mid air, change direction and move at that rate of speed. stared at it so bad i about crashed running off the highway. time frame lasting 15-20 sec. please tell me someone else saw this !!!!!
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Evansville
There were no other sightings in Evansville on or around February 26th 2012
Summary: violet/purple object super high rate of speed instant change of direction
